Summary: Large white with blue overtones light weaving among mountains
divs: Sighting DetailsShe was indoors looking out a window and saw a white with blue overtones egg shaped light approximately the size of a compact car near Grants Pass peak. She ran excitedly outdoors to have a better look at it. The light was approximately a mile from her at an altitude of approximately 2500 feet. The light was moving from North to South at the speed of a commercial aircraft. It went past the front of Grants Pass Peak. She lost sight of the light as it wove around behind another mountain approximately a mile away from where she was. There was no sound from the light. The dogs and owls in the neighborhood started making noise as the light flew by.
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Grants Pass
There were no other sightings in Grants Pass on or around July 7th 2001
